about_the_game:
In a not-so-distant future, where the atomic age meets the rusted iron of the past, welcome to CYBERFARM. The year is 2124, and the remnants of Russia have transformed into a cybernetic farmland. Dive headfirst into an experience that perfectly encapsulates both the humorous and haunting facets of the Russian soul.

Key Features:

Cyber-Bears and Atomic Turnips: Encounter genetically modified bears with a penchant for vodka and cybernetics. Farm atomic-infused crops that might either feed your village or blow it to bits!

Shooting in the Steppes: Master the art of Russian marksmanship as you defend your land from rogue cyber-bandits, mutated wildlife, and perhaps even the shadows of the past.

Laugh in the Face of Desolation: With a narrative deeply rooted in comedic undertones, find humor in the bleakest of situations. From slapstick interactions with village folks to ironic moments in the battle, comedy is your faithful companion.

Stories of the Soul: Unravel tales of love, loss, and lunacy. Each villager holds a unique story, mirroring both the bright and dark reflections of the Russian spirit.

Futuristic Farming: Manage and upgrade your cyber-farm using advanced tech from the future. But beware! With great power comes great responsibility... and a horde of envious neighbors.

Immerse yourself in this unparalleled blend of fun, farming, and firepower. Will you be the hero that CYBERFARM needs or its ultimate downfall? Only time (and your farming skills) will tell.
Dive into the future... Russian style!

name: CYBERFARM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: CYBERFARM allows you to experience the authentic life of a Russian village in the year 2124. Dive into both the bright and dark facets of the Russian soul!
